price: 66. « Adorez-vous, dit-il, en dehors d’Allah, ce qui ne peut en rien vous être utile ou nuisible ?
arabic: قَالَ أَفَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَضُرُّكُمۡ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla afataʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yanfaʿukum shayan walā yaḍurrukum
